abstract: As advisers struggle with the economic crisis, Lawrence H. Summers is often at the center of heated debates.
snippet: As advisers struggle with the economic crisis, Lawrence H. Summers is often at the center of heated debates.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  President Obama was getting his daily economic briefing one recent morning when a fly distracted him. The president swatted and missed, just as the pest buzzed near the shoes of Lawrence H. Summers, the chief White House economic adviser. “Couldn’t you aim a little higher?” deadpanned Christina D. Romer, the chairwoman of the Council of Economic Advisers.

headline.main: Obama’s Economic Circle Keeps Tensions High
headline.print_headline: President’s Economic Circle Keeps Tensions at a Simmer

abstract: As President Barack Obama’s economic advisers fight the worst financial crisis since the Depression, underlying tensions among them have arisen.
snippet: As President Barack Obama’s economic advisers fight the worst financial crisis since the Depression, underlying tensions among them have arisen.
lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama was getting his daily economic briefing one recent morning when a fly distracted him. The president swatted and missed, just as the pest buzzed near the shoes of Lawrence H. Summers, the chief White House economic adviser. “Couldn’t you aim a little higher?” deadpanned Christina D. Romer, the chairwoman of the Council of Economic Advisers.

headline.main: Obama’s Economic Circle Keeps Tensions Simmering
